sentences.english: He was apprenticed to a master silversmith.
sentences.chinese: 他跟銀匠師傅拜師學藝。

sentences.english: This set also required a silversmith …
sentences.chinese: 這套首飾還需要一個銀匠。

sentences.english: Imagine, if you will, a typical silversmith's shop.
sentences.chinese: 如果你願意的話，想象一下吧，一個典型的銀匠鋪子。

sentences.english: Next unto him repaired Uzziel the son of Harhaiah, of the goldsmiths.
sentences.chinese: 其次是銀匠哈海雅的兒子烏薛修造。

sentences.english: Take away the dross from the silver, and there shall come forth a vessel for the finer.
sentences.chinese: 除去銀子的渣滓，就有銀子出來，銀匠能以作器皿。

sentences.english: And between the going up of the corner unto the sheep gate repaired the goldsmiths and the merchants.
sentences.chinese: 銀匠與商人在城的角樓，和羊門中間修造。

sentences.english: Remove the dross from the silver, and out comes material for the silversmith;
sentences.chinese: 除去銀子的渣滓，就有銀子出來，銀匠能以做器皿。

sentences.english: Jimmy was a subtle worker in gold and silver.
sentences.chinese: 吉米是一個技藝精湛的金銀匠。

sentences.english: Mongolia silversmiths of the most unique technology that is done knife.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古銀匠最拿手的技術就是做刀。

sentences.english: This is the work of Zhu Bishan.
sentences.chinese: 傑出的銀匠朱碧山的作品。

sentences.english: Silvermiths hammer these ingots to the appropriate thickness by hand.
sentences.chinese: 銀匠用手工把這些純鐵捶打到合適的厚度。

sentences.english: He apprenticed for ten years under a master silversmith.
sentences.chinese: 他在一名銀匠師傅手下當了10年學徒。
